message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I need to make a profit, so I can only go as low as $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $12000 is the maximum I can go
